docs.text: Four Decades of the Einstein Chair Seminar The conference will be held on Jan 17-19, 2023 at CUNY Graduate Center. To attend the conference, please fill in the registration form by following the link below: Registration Form Confirmed Speakers Richard Canary (University of Michigan) Moira Chas (Stony Brook University) Ralph Cohen (Stanford University) Gregory Falkovich (Weizmann Institute of Science) Edson de Faria (University of Sao Paulo) Ruth Lawrence-Naimark (Einstein Institute of Mathematics, Hebrew University) Hee Oh (Yale University) Manuel Rivera (Purdue University) Nathan Seiberg (Institute of Advanced Study) Sebastian van Strien (Imperial College London) Nathalie Wahl (University of Copenhagen) Amie Wilkinson (University of Chicago) Organizers Ara Basmajian Bora Ferlengez Frederick Gardiner Yunping Jiang Jun Hu Linda Keen Ilya Kofman Vincent Martinez Scott Wilson Mahmoud Zeinalian Currently, the webpage is being built.
